abstract: Microsoft rebuffed a public appeal by Mikhail Gorbachev for its chairman, Bill Gates, to intervene on behalf of a Russian school principal charged with software piracy.
snippet: Microsoft rebuffed a public appeal by Mikhail Gorbachev for its chairman, Bill Gates, to intervene on behalf of a Russian school principal charged with software piracy.
lead_paragraph: PARIS, Feb. 5 — Microsoft rebuffed a public appeal by Mikhail Gorbachev on Monday for its chairman, Bill Gates, to intervene on behalf of a Russian school principal charged with software piracy.

headline.main: Microsoft Spurns Appeal to Intervene in Russian Piracy Case
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Spurns Appeal to Intervene in Russian Piracy Case
